items.sentence: I\'m sorry for my terrible French. I\'m still a beginner.
I know a lot of people who don\'t know how to play chess.
Tom is honest and expects other people to be honest, too.
Tom was going to lie, but he ended up spilling the beans.
Tom was the first paramedic on the scene of the accident.
You aren\'t really going to go camping with Tom, are you?
Tom denied that he had done what he was accused of doing.
It was obvious that Tom didn\'t want to get in the water.
It was so noisy there that I couldn\'t make myself heard.
It wasn\'t as hard to do as I thought it was going to be.
